resources.string: \tWelcome to the Voiland College Professional Practice and Experiential Learning online mock video interviewing program. Interviewing is the toughest part of a job search. Many applicants are nervous about getting caught off-guard by the questions, missing key words, rambling, and just not selling your skills and talents to the interviewer. \n\n\tWith the PPEL mock interviewing program, you\'ll be able to practice and save your recorded answers to typical questions, plus request feedback from Voiland College interviewing experts or faculty mentors. Log in and start practicing for online interviews today.

Thank you for using our app. The following sections explain the details of how to use this application.

Navigation:
	There are two ways to bring up the navigation menu on this app. Swiping from left to right across the screen, or pressing the three line icon located in the top left corner of the app.

Viewing Questions:
	 In order to watch an interview question on the questions page simply tap the question's title bar and the video question will expand and begin playing. Tap the title bar again to collapse the question. 

Recording Question:
	 To record a response to a given question just press the record answer button that is located beneath each question. You will be taken to the video capture interface where you can press a record button to start capturing your response. the button's text will change to 'stop' to indicate that you are recording. Press the button to stop recording. You can record up to a two minute video.

	 After recording you will be prompted to save or delete the video. If you delete the video it will be removed from your computer. If you save it then the video will be stored until you decide to delete it. Only one video response can be saved per question.
This sample needs permission for camera and audio recording.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
